When your ex covers up a tattoo of your face, there really is only one thing for it.

Chloe Ferry put on a racy G-string to show Sam Gowland exactly what he is missing out on.

Months after they finally ended their on-off relationship for good , he took drastic action to try and move on.

The former Love Islander, 24, had the Geordie Shore babe's face on his thigh - and knew it was time to do something about it.

Now Chloe is the one showing she is moving forward and the beauty is clearly oozing confidence.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

"I’m always disappointed when a liars pants don’t catch on fire," she captioned one of her shots.

The incredible pictures already have more than 250,000 likes between them and her fans were clearly impressed.

It turned toxic when the pair finally called it a day.

Sam accused Chloe of ' lying, cheating and selling fake stories ' while she accused him of having sex with his Love Island co-star Amber Davies.

But last month Chloe was all about happiness and healing as she put the rough end to one side.

(Image: samgowland /Instagram)

(Image: MTV)

(Image: instagram)

"Everything heals. Your body heals. Your heart heals. The mind heals. Wounds heal. Your soul repairs itself. Your happiness is always going to come back," said one quote on Instagram .

Another read: "The universe is not in a hurry. You are. It's why you are anxious, stressed and disappointed.

"Trust that what was meant to be yours, will be yours."
description: The Geordie Shore star dropped plenty of hints as she posted pictures of her incredible body
